forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 16 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a sunny disposition, the golden sun slowly retreating toward the horizon as temperatures hover around a cool, refreshing 60 degrees. A brisk west-southwest wind dances through the streets, swaying the trees and carrying hints of the bay’s saltiness. Yet, the panorama reveals a gentleness, as the low-hanging clouds begin to claim their territory, casting a muted warmth over the city. The evening promises a soft embrace of mostly cloudy skies, wrapping the bustling streets in an intimate, comforting shroud.

Given this ever-shifting tapestry, a light layer would serve you well—perhaps a well-tailored cardigan or a snug jacket for those who find solace in warmth. With the evening’s approach, a stroll could lead you to the waterfront, where the fading light mingles with the whispers of the waves. Alternatively, an exploration of the neighborhood cafés could be a delightful escape, the aroma of fresh pastries beckoning as the winds weave stories of another day. With such conditions, the evening unfolds with an inviting charm that encourages a gentle pause in your bustling routine.
